description: Aboriginal/Indigenous studies is an interdisciplinary field of inquiry that seeks to understand the ways in which indigenous peoples worldwide, despite their incredible diversity,share a common experience of colonization.
Of interest to students who have a non-business degree and want to return to university for one or two years to acquire a specialty in a functional area of business.

The Bachelor of Real Estate Management program allows you, as a member of the real estate community, to upgrade your education so you can meet the accreditation requirements for various professional associations.
